channel.title: Shake Down - Trance & Progressive Podcast
channel.description: Tune In, Get Down. THE ULTIMATE TRANCE PODCAST. Shake Down is a digital trance mix show featuring today's newest trance tracks, mixed with classic old school anthems. Hosted by Christopher Reddick, Shake Down features his mixes as well as mixes from guest DJs all over the world. Visit us on www.ShakeDownPodcast.com for tracklistings of every mix and more info. Also, give us a call us and leave Shake Down an audio comment to be played on the air!!! Call us at +1(818) 574-5079 (Los Angeles #)
channel.copyright: All songs © by their publishing owners, these mixes © Christopher Reddick & Resonant Vibes 2006, 2007, 2008, 2009, 2010, 2011
channel.itunes:author: Christopher Reddick
channel.itunes:subtitle: Shake Down - Trance & Progressive Mixes hosted by Christopher Reddick
channel.itunes:summary: Tune In, Get Down. THE ULTIMATE TRANCE PODCAST. Shake Down is a digital Trance & Progressive mix show featuring today's newest dance music tracks, mixed with classic old school anthems. Hosted by Christopher Reddick, Shake Down features his mixes as well as mixes from guest DJs all over the world. Visit us on www.ShakeDownPodcast.com for tracklistings of every mix and more info.
channel.itunes:keywords: techno, trance, electronica, mixes, music, melodic, trippy, electro, techno, trance music, dance music, trance, tribal, electronic, armada records, chris reddick, reddick, rave

If you live in the LA area, come hang out at UNWIND this Sunday night Sept 2nd 2007~! This event is so much fun, I promise a great time.. plus, ITS FREE~! Email me to get on the guest list.

Believe...Productions and Kristina Sky Present... UNWIND

@ The Mor | 2941 Main St. Santa Monica

:: 1st Sunday of the month (mark your calendar!)

:: FREE Entrance (on guestlist)

:: Bring your good friends + good vibes

:: NO dresscode, come comfortable

:: Doors @ 7:00 PM - 2:00 AM

:: Happy Hour Drinks and Appetizers from 7:00PM - 9:00PM

:: 6+ Hours of Great Music

:: Perfect way to UNWIND at the end of the weekend.

** If you haven't been down to the Mor yet you've got to check out what you're missing! Just blocks from the beach in Santa Monica, it’s an awesome little spot for winding down (hence the UNWIND name) on a Sunday night with a quality sound system, awesome decor, great bar, friendly staff, and most importantly, good food, friends, and music.

Venue website::: http://www.themorbar.com
